channel.title: Synergy-Pkz ~ Development Team! ~ 317
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i35.tinypic.com/2yxlxkl.png[/img][/center] [b] Idea:[/b] Synergy-Pkz will be VERY unique but not so unique that we lose the RuneScape concept you all love. The EXP rate will be slow but not to slow. This will be a PK based server with hopefully one of the best economys ever seen. If you want to be a part of our team use this application or you are automatically denied! If you make an application and we have no clue who you are, your not going to be accepted (unless you show proof that you can do what you apply for)
What are you applying for: How much experience do you have: Proof of any work that might help your application: Age: Other:
[b]OWNER[/b] Austin [b]Co-Owner[/b] Matt [b]Administrators[/b] Josh All Coders OPEN OPEN [b]Moderators[/b] Justin David OPEN OPEN OPEN OPEN [b]GFX Designers[/b] Justin Daniel OPEN [b]Coders[/b] Jake (main) kingdomkey01 Coder2 (part time) OPEN [b]Hoster[/b] 3GB RAM VPS [b] Backup Hoster[/b] Matt (6gb RAM)

item.description:

[center]

2yxlxkl.png800Ã—200
[/center]


Idea:
Synergy-Pkz will be VERY unique but not so unique that we lose the RuneScape concept you all love. The EXP rate will be slow but not to slow. This will be a PK based server with hopefully one of the best economys ever seen.

If you want to be a part of our team use this application or you are automatically denied! If you make an application and we have no clue who you are, your not going to be accepted (unless you show proof that you can do what you apply for)
